title: Abe Lincoln's First Book
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James L. Winokur
provenance_text:
Downtown Gallery, New York, 1944; Mr. and Mrs. Alvin P. Fenderson, Paoli, PA, by 1947. (Makler Gallery [1960-1989], Philadelphia); Mr. and Mrs. James L. Winokur, Pittsburgh, 1965? until 1968. Gift to museum, 1968.

Under review by CGK
